page.title: 03HINSTOCK BY-PASS
page.content: HINSTOCK BY-PASS The By_Pass was opened in 1983. It carries the heavy traffic of the A41 Merseyside to Midlands link. It cost nearly one million pounds to constuct. The old road used to go right passed the school. The school is one of the few schools that have double glazing. This is to cut out the noise. Now the school is much quieter. We did a traffic survey to see how many vehicles would have gave passed the school if the By_pass had not been built.In a half hour period we counted one hundred and eighty vehicles travelling on the new road. This averages one vehicle every ten seconds. Many of the vehicles are lorries. We feel the By-Pass has greatly helped our school.
